Description.Text: Hotel Facilities: Reception area, Safe, Money Exchange,Breakfast Room, Snack/Pool Bar, Beach Reastaurant, TV Corner, Conference room, Mobile phone network, Public Internet, WLAN access point, Room service, Laundry service, Wheelchair accessible, Car park, Playground, Outdoor Fresh water pool, Children's pool, Sunbathing Terrace with Sun loungers & Parasols, Sun loungers & Parasols on the beach. Room Facilities: Bathroom, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Direct dial telephone, Satellite / cable TV, Internet access, Mini fridge, Individual air-conditioned, Individual heating, Safe, Balcony, Terrace

The hotel is located 9 Km west of the city of Chania on the sandy beach of Agia Marina tourist area. There is bus connection to Chania and the nearby villages,while taxis are available 24 hours. The location combines a peaceful and relaxing environment with a variety of facilities such as shopping center, cafeterias, bars, restaurants, water sports.
